pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Duke-AI Development PackageThis is a duke development package for the developers.To know more about us can, you visit our [website](http://duke.ai/).#### check_rate_con_schema: Checks the basic schema whether it is standardized schema or not.```{r}from dukeai.rpa_functions.ratecon_schema_check import check_rate_con_schemacheck_rate_con_schema(rate_con_data, only_warning=False)```#### check_rate_con_data: Checks the minimum required data in the rate confirmation.```{r}from dukeai.rpa_functions.ratecon_data_check import check_rate_con_datacheck_rate_con_data(rate_con_data)```#### Get the rate confirmation standardized schema```{r}from functions.get_ratecon_schema import get_rate_confirmation_schema, get_stops_schema, get_entity_schemafrom functions.get_ratecon_schema import get_reference_schema, get_note_schema, get_dates_schema```
